TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIViewAnimationOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration indicating animation options.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions AllowAnimatedContent = unsigned int64(128)

Docs.summary: If set, views are animated by changing their properties and redrawing. If not set, the views are animated using a snapshot image.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions AllowUserInteraction = unsigned int64(2)

Docs.summary: This flag instructs the system to keep sending input events to the view during the animation. By default input events are disabled when an animation is taking place.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions Autoreverse = unsigned int64(16)

Docs.summary: If set, the animation will automatically reverse once it completes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions BeginFromCurrentState = unsigned int64(4)

Docs.summary: Starts the animation from the current view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions CurveEaseIn = unsigned int64(65536)

Docs.summary: Uses an EaseIn animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions CurveEaseInOut = unsigned int64(0)

Docs.summary: Uses an EasyInOut animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions CurveEaseOut = unsigned int64(131072)

Docs.summary: Uses an EaseOut animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions CurveLinear = unsigned int64(196608)

Docs.summary: Uses a linear animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions LayoutSubviews = unsigned int64(1)

Docs.summary: Lays out subviews at commit time so they are animated along with their parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions OverrideInheritedCurve = unsigned int64(64)

Docs.summary: If set, the animation will use the original curve specified when the animation was submitted, not the curve of the in-flight animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions OverrideInheritedDuration = unsigned int64(32)

Docs.summary: If set, the animation will use the original duration value, rather than the remaining duration of the in-flight animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions OverrideInheritedOptions = unsigned int64(512)

Docs.summary: The option to not inherit the animation type or any other options.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions PreferredFramesPerSecond30 = unsigned int64(117440512)

Docs.summary: Constant that indicates that 30 frames per second are preferred for animations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions PreferredFramesPerSecond60 = unsigned int64(50331648)

Docs.summary: Constant that indicates that 60 frames per second are preferred for animations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions PreferredFramesPerSecondDefault = unsigned int64(0)

Docs.summary: Constant that indicates that the default frame rate is preferred for animations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions Repeat = unsigned int64(8)

Docs.summary: If set, the animation will repeat.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions ShowHideTransitionViews = unsigned int64(256)

Docs.summary: If set, views are hidden and shown (not removed or added) during transition. Both views must already be in the parent view's hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionCrossDissolve = unsigned int64(5242880)

Docs.summary: A transition that dissolves between views.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionCurlDown = unsigned int64(4194304)

Docs.summary: A transition that curls a view down from the top.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionCurlUp = unsigned int64(3145728)

Docs.summary: A transition that curls a view up from the bottom.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionFlipFromBottom = unsigned int64(7340032)

Docs.summary: A transition that flips a view around its horizontal axis from bottom to top. The bottom moves forward and the top moves back.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionFlipFromLeft = unsigned int64(1048576)

Docs.summary: A transition that flips a view around its vertical axis from left to right. The left side comes forward and the right moves backward.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionFlipFromRight = unsigned int64(2097152)

Docs.summary: A transition that flips a view around its vertical axis from right to left. The right side comes forward and the left moves backward.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionFlipFromTop = unsigned int64(6291456)

Docs.summary: A transition that flips a view around its horizontal axis from top to bottom. The top moves forward and the bottom moves back.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationOptions TransitionNone = unsigned int64(0)

Docs.summary: No transition.
